subject: Raceteam Sponsorship Mazda MaX-5
description_text:
Dear Simsonn,

My name is Brandon Oosterink, a motivated and ambitious racing driver
determined to make my dream in motorsport a reality. It would be an honor
if you would consider supporting me on my journey toward competing in the
Mazda MaX-5 Cup.

For the past six years, I have also been actively involved in sim racing,
which has become an essential part of my development as a driver. I train
almost daily using advanced simulators to refine my racecraft, improve
consistency, and study tracks in great detail. This dedication has helped
me build strong fundamentals that translate directly to real-world racing.
Because of this background, I believe that collaborating with Simsonn known
for its innovation and commitment to performance would be a meaningful and
natural fit.

I am now ready to take the next step, transitioning into car racing with
the goal of making my debut in the Mazda MaX-5 Cup. This championship is
one of the most competitive and popular entry-level racing series in the
Netherlands, attracting significant media coverage through RTL GP,
Autosport.nl, and various social media channels. This creates excellent
exposure opportunities for all involved partners, providing a powerful
platform to showcase the Simsonn brand in a positive and dynamic way.

In addition, my personal online reach has grown substantially over the past
months. In the last five months alone, my videos have accumulated over 30
million views across multiple platforms. This allows me to present your
brand in a fresh, authentic, and effective manner to a young and highly
engaged audience.

Moreover, my participation in the Mazda MaX-5 Cup will be followed by a
film crew producing a documentary about my journey toward professional
racing. This series will be published on YouTube and shared across various
social media platforms. The goal is to show what it truly takes to build a
motorsport career that it’s not as easy as it may seem, but above all, a
story of passion, perseverance, and growth. Naturally, this documentary
will also provide additional exposure for your brand, which will be visible
on-screen and integrated into the inspiring narrative of this racing
journey.

I would love to involve Simsonn in this adventure by featuring your brand
on my racing suit, helmet, and car. To achieve a strong and professional
appearance together, I would like to request your support as a sponsorship
contribution. Your brand will receive prominent visibility during every
race and throughout the documentary both on the circuit and across online
media.

Furthermore, you are warmly invited to attend any of the races to meet the
team, experience the atmosphere firsthand, and see how your brand comes to
life during official championship events. This not only offers a unique
experience but also strengthens the personal connection between Simsonn and
the world of motorsport.

I would be delighted to further discuss my plans and the potential
collaboration in a meeting or call at your convenience.

Thank you very much for your time and consideration.

Kind regards,
Brandon Oosterink

conversations.body_text: Hi brandon,    May I view your channel? I shall submit it to our manager for approval.

Hi Simsonn,

Thank you for your reply!

Here’s an overview of the social media channels I currently manage. YouTube
will be added soon, but that channel is still in development. All the
content you’ll find there such as edits and highlights from Formula 1 has
been created by me. I mainly do this to learn what engages people and how
to capture their attention. That’s why you’ll see a variety of topics and
niches in my content.

Here are the links to my channels:

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@brandonf1contend
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@bralav.ae?lang=nl-NL
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bralav.07/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/brandonf1contend/

In addition, I’m considering documenting my karting career in the form of a
YouTube documentary. I want to show everything that comes with it, both the
highs and the challenges of the sport. For inspiration, I’ve been looking
at productions like these:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pfTbl52yVPg
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kbzCTYZ9A1s&t=137s

Since I’m currently studying Media Design, I already have solid experience
in filming and editing. However, I’m considering bringing someone along or
hiring someone to handle the filming so I can fully focus on racing and
performing on track.

I have put the screenshots of the last month here down below from Instagram
and the White screenshots are those from tiktok but longer ago.

I’d love to hear what you think about this and if you might have any tips
or ideas!

Best regards,
Brandon Oosterink

Hi brandon,    We would be pleased to learn more about your plans and potential collaboration opportunities.

Hi Simsonn,

I would like to share my plans for the upcoming racing season and explain
how a collaboration between us could create strong visibility and value for
both sides.

The new season will begin in March/April, and my goal is to have everything
fully prepared by then. To get ready, I will be training extensively on my
home simulator. I believe that using your equipment would significantly
improve the quality of my training, and it would also allow us to showcase
your products in a very authentic and professional way.

As part of the documentary being filmed about my journey into motorsport,
we will capture a lot of footage at my home specifically focusing on
training sessions, behind-the-scenes preparation, and the tools that help
me progress. This gives us an excellent opportunity to feature Simsonn
prominently. We plan to produce additional videos dedicated entirely to
reviewing, showing, and experiencing your products.

In real racing, the car will be fully stickered for the season, and your
logo would be placed on the car, my suit, and included visibly throughout
the documentary. This guarantees that Simsonn will be represented both
on-track and online to a growing audience.

Looking ahead to 2026, my goal is to achieve the same or even greater reach
and online visibility as in 2025, continuing the growth of my channels and
presence in motorsport. I would be very happy to continue working with
Simsonn as a season sponsor as my career develops further.

In order to participate in the Mazda MaX-5 Cup at a competitive level, I am
required to cover essential costs such as the race car, team support,
maintenance, and race entries. Therefore, part of the sponsorship
contribution would help fund these key elements that make it possible for
me to compete throughout the season. Your support would directly enable me
to take this important step in my racing career while representing the
Simsonn brand with professionalism and dedication.

If this aligns with your vision, I would love to discuss the possibilities
with you.

Kind regards,
Brandon Oosterink
